text:
@narendramodi Dear PM
It's a tragedy to say people of our country are aware about the virus but are not aware about their habits!! "Casual behaviour can make a casualty!! "Let them know that it's not a holiday. Covid19 doesn't spread on its own.. It's we who spread it!
